encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - No indication of recto/verso, if the other side is blank. Col. 1,5 ]νω̣ underdot ν, not ω., 6: lost.6lin. 7. Line not entered before line 7: ]ν[ο]ς γραμ, no space before φ, instead of [.?] add supplement from ed. pr.. L. 10 vac.-> lost. Col. 2, l. 3, 5, 13, 15: move paragraphos to the middle between this and the following line; l. 3 γνώριμος· -> γνώριμος·*middot*, l. 4: no dot below δ and ος, l. 5 βασιλέως·*middot*, l. 8 ʼ Αρίσταρ no space after breathing, l. 9 χος · -> χος·*middot*, l. 11 νος · -> νος·*middot*, ʼ Α delete space after breathing, l.13 no reg for iota subscript, *middot*, l.15 τέκνων·*middot*, l.17 φ[ό]ρων·*middot*, τῷ -> iota adscript, l.19 Ζηνόδωρος -> Ζηνό[δωρος], l.24 προσαγορεύεσθαι· -> προσαγορεύεσθαι·*middot*, l.21 [*middot*], l.25 ἐξάγαγε\ι̣/ν perispomenon, l.27 αὑτοῦ·*middot*, l.31 γῷ iota adscript, l.32 το̣ῦ̣τ̣ον·*middot*, l. 35 f. Κεφάλῳ τῷ [ʼΑθην]α̣ί̣|[ῷ] iota adscript Col. 3, l. 2, 4, 12, 27: move paragraphos to the middle between this and the following line, l.2 χώρας·*middot*, l.7 <:ὑπὸ|reg| υ(¨)πο:> -> ὑ(¨)πὸ, l.12 ---- *diple* -> diple-obelismene, ναι·*middot*, l.14 delete spaces, l.15 τ [.2] [.15] τῶν ἐ -> τ.2[.15] [τῶν ἐ], l.19 missing, adjust following line n.os, l. 8 diple-obelismene, ἔθαψεν·*middot*, l. 31 <:ʼΙους|reg|ʼ Ι(¨)ους:> -> ʼΙ(¨)οῦς, l.33 ἔθηκεν·*middot*, l. 35 35.- Col. 4, l. 26,32: move paragraphos to the middle between this and the following line, l. 5 <:ʼΙνάχου|reg| Ι(¨)ναχου:>· -> ʼΙ(¨)νάχου·*middot*, l. 7 Ἰ(¨) 8.- [σμηνο]ῦ̣, l.10 ]ῆς·*middot*, l.12 Ἄρη·*middot*, l.13 τῷ Εὐβοίᾳ σπη 14.- [λαί]ῳ iota adscript, l.14 <:Τεύχιον|reg|τε[[κ]]\υ/χιον:>· -> Τε[[κ]]\ύ/χιον·*middot*, l.18 σκεπαζόντων·*middot*, l.19 <:ἱστοροῦσιν|reg|ϊστοροῦσιν:> Ἄρη· -> ἱ(¨)στοροῦσιν Ἄρη·*middot*, l.20 ἀρήϊα -> ἀρή ι(¨)α, l.22 [κῃ iota adscript, l.24 ʼ Α delete space after breathing, l.26 τόν·*middot*, l.29 Εὐβοίᾳ iota adscript, l.30 space after ]ν̣, l.36 <:ὑφ̣[ῆ]ν̣[αι]|reg| υ(¨)φ̣[η]ν̣[αι]:> -> ὑ(¨)φ̣[ῆ]ν̣[αι] Col. 5, l. 2, 6, 12, 18, 22, 28: move paragraphos to the middle between this and the following line, l.1.- α, l. 3 ʽ Ελ delete space after breathing, l.4 dipunct in margin, l.5 diple in margin, hyphen, l.6 α·*middot*, l.9f. <:ὕ 10.- στερον|reg| υ(¨) 10.- στερον:> -> *middot* ὕ(¨) 10.- στερον, l.12 12.- *diple-obelismene ποιήσασθαι·*middot* ἀσπί *filler*, l.14 κομίσαι·*middot*, l.15 <:ἱστοροῦσιν|reg|ϊστοροῦσιν:> -> ἱ(¨)στοροῦσιν, l.18 ἀδελφόν·*middot*, l.19 ʼ Ακ delete space after breathing, l.22 ξυλίνας·*middot*, l.24 diple in margin, l. 25 ʼ Οφιούσσῃ νήσῳ· delete space after breathing, iota adscript, *middot*, l.26 ἐνοπλί proparoxytonon, l.30 καταδεῖξαι·*middot* *filler*, l. 31 <:ἱστοροῦσιν|reg|ϊστοροῦσιν:> -> ἱ(¨)στοροῦσιν, l. 33 ʼΑρ̣γε̣ῖοι dot γ, l.36 ριέθεντο·*middot* col. 6, l. 3, 6, 14, 16, 19, 24: move paragraphos to the middle between this and the following line, l. 1 ἐπ̣[ι ἐστρα] [.?] -> ἐπ̣[ι][.6] [ἐστρα(?)], l. 2 το [.12], l.3 diple-obelismene, l.4 <:ὑπ’|reg|ϋπ':> -> ὑ(¨)π’, l.5 ησθαι·*middot*, l.6 diple-obelismene, l.7 θρᾴκης iota adscript, l.11-13 space before [, l.14 diple-obelismene, [δι], l.15 [τῶν .9] -> [τῶν] [.9], l.16 νων·*middot*, l.19 diple-obelismene, ὑ(¨)π, l.22 σγοῦ·*middot*, l.24 diple-obelismene, Διός·*middot*, l.25 diple in margin, l.26 Ἀ̣μ̣ε̣ι̣ν̣[ no dot below ε, l.28 lost.5lin, adjust following numbers, l.33 paragraphos, l.35 lost.?lin

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - No indication of recto/verso, if the other side is blank. Col. 1,5 ]νω̣ underdot ν, not ω., 6: lost.6lin. 7.
